sentences.sContent: The clouds exhibit thin, wispy light blue forms that contrast with the darkness of space (image upper right).
sentences.sContent_eng: The clouds exhibit thin, wispy light blue forms that contrast with the darkness of space (image upper right).
sentences.sCn: 云层稀薄而纤细，并泛着蓝光，和无尽的黑暗太空形成对比（右上部分）。

synos.tran: 象小束状的，纤细的；脆弱的

remMethod.val: 来自wisp(n. 小把， 小束)
